main: ^Nyaaah? A new farmer joining the ranks? Finally! I've been waiting for this day for AGES.
^Oh, you're not a village folk. Looks like I got my hopes up for nooothing....
^But you look like such a stroong human. Why don't you come help out a little at the farm? I'm just sooo, so tired.
^Just getting rid of <color=yellow>fifty of those pesky bats</color> would be purrrfect. I know you can do it.

c-0: ^<size=35>Of all the luck, I just had to meet a crazy human today!</size>
^<size=35>I'll just pretend the last ten seconds never happened...breathe in....breathe out...nyah.</size>
^Ahem! Where was I? Ah, yes, I just hate those flying creatures. They've been stealing our crops recently.
^Why, I'm waiting right here until the farm to the left is fully devoid of those insane creatures.
^I think killing <color=yellow>five of them</color> is fine. Yes, absolutely fine.

accepted: ^Nyah, the mad human is back! Act natural, act natural...

b: ^You haven't forgotten what I wanted, right? <color=yellow>Five bats.</color> Destroyed.
^Now off you go, human. Come back later - or never!
^You haven't forgotten what I wanted, right? <color=yellow>Five bats.</color> Destroyed.
^Now off you go, human. Come back later - or never!
^You haven't forgotten what I wanted, right? <color=yellow>Five bats.</color> Destroyed.
^Now off you go, human. Come back later - or never!

^Now off you go, human. Come back later - or never!
^You haven't forgotten what I wanted, right? <color=yellow>Five bats.</color> Destroyed.
^Now off you go, human. Come back later - or never!
^Yes, you've killed enough bats. Loathe as I am to do it, I'll sing your praises to the town head.

final: ^I'll be sure to give the town head my approval. You did clear out the farm, after all.
